translations: v.看待；注视；注意；涉及（regard 的第三人称单数）
n.注意；尊重；致意（regard 的复数）

phrs.translation: 诚挚的问候；最好的祝福；致敬

sentences.sentence: I have little information as regards her fitness for the post.
sentences.translation: 至于说她是否适合这个职位，我无可奉告。

sentences.sentence: He regards himself as a patriot.
Give your brother my regards when you see him.
sentences.translation: 看到你哥哥时，代我向他问好。
